attributes.action: Stop being taxed after 40 hours work.
attributes.additional_details: Because we work hard and overtime is a great way to earn extra cash but we barely get the extra because it’s taxed basically working overtime to pay the tax.
attributes.background: After the year we’ve had all the workers that have carried on through the pandemic. I think everyone should only get taxed on 40 hours work. Any overtime should be tax free. Reward the people who are working hard instead of taking from them.
